S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4278: Batch inserts with Clobs fails with the embedded driver. Explicitly set whether the Clob is written to a soft upgraded database or not, as there isn't enough context at write time (run-time) to decide it then.
Patch file: derby-4278-1a-regression_test.diff, derby-4278-2a-fix.diff
